CustomField.description: Pre-Import - Record has just been created in interface table Pre-Import Valid - Record has passed pre-import validations Record Created - Record has been created in target system Post-Import Valid - Post record creation validations completed Error - Record is in error state
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pre-Import - Record has just been created in interface table Pre-Import Valid - Record has passed pre-import validations Record Created - Target record created Post-Import Valid - Post record creation validations completed Error - Record in error
CustomField.label: Stage
